name: In Other Lifetimes
description:
How many bonds will you mark as significant in your lifetime? How many will you only remember as prints left in the snow?

It's up to you to decide what's important to pick up on your journey, or if there's anything you want to bring with you at all.

You'll never know what you missed out by choosing to walk your path alone.

Directions:

To move and interact use arrow keys
